nodes.text: Ranzar Malk's crew was a gang of mercenaries led by ex-Imperial sharpshooter Migs Mayfeld in order to rescue the Twi'lek Qin from the Bothan-Five, a New Republic Correctional Transport, around 9 ABY. Although they were able to recover Qin, the crew betrayed one of their own, the Mandalorian bounty hunter Din Djarin. Djarin, however, was able to lock Mayfeld and two other mercenaries, Burg and Qin's sister, Xi'an, in a prison cell and destroy the droid Q9-0, taking Qin back to his client Ranzar Malk.
